column4: ok, does anybody have suggestions on how I can go about getting the touch pad working?
does it need to be run in root
it just gave me a bunch of options on the usage
cant get hold of a copy
once you install ubuntu in thoery you will never have to again... so no you just need an internet connection
so your mouse dont work??? thats odd

really? now thats really strange.... if you go into your livecd and put your xorg.conf onto like a floppy or thumb drive then install ubuntu and use the saved one ... or just look at the differences it may work
